Welcome to the app that will change your: Welcome to the app that will change your life.
Let's calculate your body needs in calor: Let's calculate your body needs in calories.
During the day how much time do you spen: During the day how much time do you spend doing each of these activities?
Please Be specific and honest to get the: Please be specific and honest to get the right estimations.
If you don't do an activity leave at 0 h: If you don't do an activity leave at 0 hours.
sum activities: The sum of all your activities must be equal to exactly 24 hours.
How many hours do you spend sleeping, re: How many hours do you spend sleeping, resting lying down and napping per day?
How many hours do you spend in a sitting: How many hours do you spend in a sitting position such as eating, sewing, using the computer, working at the office, reading, writing, transporting, playing video games, watching TV
How many hours do you spend in a standin: How many hours do you spend in a standing position such as shopping, washing, moving around the house or office, cooking?
How many hours do you spend doing modera: How many hours do you spend doing moderate activities: manual work in a standing position: work in industry, machines, carpentry?
How many hours do you spend doing constr: How many hours do you spend doing construction work, gardening (digging), walking, car repair, masonry, and plasterwork?
How many hours do you spend in intense a: How many hours do you spend in intense activity: sports, earthworks, agriculture, forestry?
How many hours do you spend doing a mode: How many hours do you spend doing a moderate activity such as: walking, gardening, yoga, gymnastics, house cleaning?
How many hours do you spend working out?: How many hours do you spend working out?

PrivacyPolicyDescription: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use the Ukla mobile application.
CollectionUsePersonalInfo: Collection and Use of Personal Information:
CollectPersonalInfo: When you use our application, we collect the personal information you voluntarily provide us, such as your name, first name, email address, gender, and age. We use this information to create and manage your account on our application, as well as to calculate your nutritional needs, including calories, proteins, and other nutrients, to provide you with personalized recommendations and a better user experience.
ConfidentialInfo: We do not share your personal information with third parties. Your information is kept confidential and is used only for the purposes mentioned above.
DataSecurityDescription: We take the security of your personal data very seriously. All data transmissions between your device and our servers are encrypted. Additionally, our database offers strong security features to protect your information. User passwords are also encrypted to ensure additional protection.
UserRightsDescription: You have the right to access and modify the personal data stored in your profile at any time. Additionally, you can request the deletion of your account, which will result in the permanent removal of all your personal data from our systems.
Contact usDescription: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@uklanutrition.com
PrivacyPolicy: This Privacy Policy is subject to change. Please check this page regularly for any updates.
PrivacyPolicyUpdate: This Privacy Policy was updated on 19/02/2024.
TermsOfServiceIntroduction: Welcome to Ukla, a mobile meal planning application. These Terms of Service (or 'Terms') govern your use of the Ukla app. By creating an account or using Ukla, you agree to these terms.
UserAccountsDescription: To use the Ukla application, you must be at least 13 years old or have the legal minimum age required in your country. You must register by providing accurate and up-to-date information, including your name, first name, email address, gender, and age. You are responsible for the security of your login credentials.
AppFeaturesDescription: Ukla offers features to plan your meals, track your nutritional needs, and receive personalized recommendations. We do not sell your personal data, but we will show you relevant ads based on your interests and activity.
UserContentDescription: You are responsible for the content you post or share on Ukla. Ukla reserves the right to remove or modify any content violating our policies or applicable laws. You retain ownership of your content, but you grant Ukla a non-exclusive worldwide license to use it in accordance with your privacy settings.
SecurityPrivacyDescription: Ukla implements security measures to protect your personal data. However, you should take your own precautions to secure your information. Please read our Privacy Policy for more information on how we collect, use, and protect your data.
AdsRevenueDescription: Ukla displays ads in a way that supports the app and ensures it remains free for users. We use your data to present you with more relevant ads.
AppModificationsDescription: Ukla reserves the right to modify or update these conditions or the app at any time. In case of major changes, we will notify you in a timely manner.
TerminationDescription: You can deactivate or delete your account at any time. Ukla may terminate your account or restrict your access in case of violation of these conditions.
ObligationsRestrictionsDescription: You must not use Ukla for illegal, fraudulent, or harmful purposes. You must not use the app to transmit illegal, inappropriate, offensive, or harmful content. You may not use Ukla to harm other users or violate their rights. The app is intended for personal use. Any commercial use without prior authorization is prohibited.
IntellectualPropertyDescription: Ukla respects intellectual property rights and expects its users to do the same. You may not use Ukla's intellectual property without authorization.
ConclusionDescription: These terms govern your use of the Ukla app. If you have any questions or disagreements, do not hesitate to contact us at contact@uklanutrition.com. We hope you enjoy your experience with Ukla!
